name: Pollen Puff
description: You send forth a flurry of pollen at a target in range. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing 2d8 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. If the target is an ally, this move automatically hits and heals for the amount of damage instead.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
